name: Campsite Reports OFFICIAL WordPress Plugin
author: Brian Prom

sections.description:
The Campsite Reports online reservation system allows you to accept online reservations for your campground with minimal effort!

This plugin requires that you have an account (free) with Campsite Reports for your campground. Don’t have a Campsite Reports account? Qucikly create an account for your campground here.

  • Accept reservations on your WordPress website
  • This system is free for campground owners to use (a small service fee is charged to the customer)
  • Quick and easy setup and integration

Get started now!

  • Learn More
  • View Demo WordPress Site
  • View Demo of Campground Administration
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder ‘campsitereports to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin ‘Campsite Reports OFFICIAL WordPress Plugin’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place shortcode in your page in your pages as described on the ‘CSR Settings -> Instructions’ page in the WordPress Admin
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial plugin release
  • Shortcodes for Reservation, Success, and no-payment pages

short_description: Integrate the Free Online Reservation System from Campsite Reports into your WordPress site. Easily accept online reservations for your campground.

screenshots.caption: WordPress Admin Screen.  Simply enter your CampSite Reports ParkID and add short codes where you want your reservation page (see screenshots below) to appear on the site.
This is the initial reservation screen customers will see.  The customer can search for available dates and specify camping equipment.
A list of the available dates with pictures of the campsite are displayed.  The customer then chooses which campsite they wish to reserve.
The next step is for the customer to fill out their reservation form.
